description:
Slide this pick on your Camp ice tool for solid sticks and minimal ice penetration in brittle ice or technical mixed terrain. The multi-part design lets you use it alone or with a hammer or adze.

  • Teeth down the shaft suit hooking and mixed terrain
  • T-rated
  • Compatible with X-Dream and X-All Mountain tools only
name: Camp X-Dream / X-All Mountain Mixte Pick - Unisex
